title: How to Get Verified on Snapchat: Criteria, Application & More

steps.title: Snapchat offers Snap Star status to celebrities and culturally relevant creators.
steps.content: Snapchat offers Snap Star status to celebrities and culturally relevant creators. You can be approved for Snap Star status once you've shown that you create high-quality content and have grown a large audience. [1] X Research source Snap Star status adds a gold star next to your profile if you are approved and verified, which adds authenticity to your profile, business, or brand. [2] X Research source The gold star is similar to the blue check mark on other social media platforms such as Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter. As Snapchat decides who qualifies as a Snap Star on a case-by-case basis, you are not guaranteed Snap Star status. Once you have a Snap Star, you'll be eligible to have your content featured across Snapchat. [3] X Research source There are ways to increase your chances of acceptance, such as following the criteria needed.

steps.title: Account engagement.
steps.content: Account engagement. You must have a large audience viewing your Stories. While the number of views isn't specified, you must consistently have high engagement on your Stories. [4] X Research source Viewers must watch your whole story to count as a single view.

steps.title: Frequent sharing of high-quality content.
steps.content: Frequent sharing of high-quality content. To be verified, you'll need to frequently share high-quality Snaps to your Story. The more entertaining and share-worthy your Snaps, the better your chances at becoming verified. [5] X Research source In some cases, if you're popular on other social medias , they will upgrade your account.

steps.title: Stories for a public audience.
steps.content: Stories for a public audience. Your account must be used primarily and consistently to create and share stories with the public. [6] X Research source With all interactions over the internet, be sure to stay safe on Snapchat .

steps.title: Authenticity.
steps.content: Authenticity. Your account must represent a real person such as yourself and represent your unique presence. This means that more general interest-focused accounts won't be considered for Snap Star status. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Cultural relevance and notability.
steps.content: Cultural relevance and notability. Snapchat considers if your account is highly searched for or culturally relevant. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Quality of content.
steps.content: Quality of content. The content you share on your Stories must follow Snapchat's Community Guidelines and be safe, original, and appropriate for all Snapchat users. [9] X Research source Keep in mind that Snapchat can accept or reject any application for Snap Star status in its discretion.

steps.title: Open Snapchat.
steps.content: Open Snapchat. Snapchat does not have a form you can fill out to be verified on the platformâ€”instead, Snapchat automatically awards users with Snap Star status once they meet the criteria. However, you may be able to get verified by informing Snapchat that other users are duplicating or stealing your content. In this case, Snapchat may consider giving you a Snap Star to help protect your account and content. This will work best if you're a known creator with a substantial number of views. If you can't prove that you need to protect your brand or intellectual property, Snapchat will likely reject you. Creating a public profile may help you manage your content.

steps.title: Tap on your profile icon.
steps.content: Tap on your profile icon. This is indicated by your Bitmoji in the top left corner. Your Settings will open.

steps.title: Tap Settings in the top right corner.
steps.content: Tap Settings in the top right corner.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap I Need Help.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap I Need Help . You can find this underneath Support .

steps.title: Select My Snapchat isn't working.
steps.content: Select My Snapchat isn't working . This will open more options below.

steps.title: Tap Yes.
steps.content: Tap Yes . You can find this on the bottom of the page, below Need help with something else?

steps.title: Tap My issue is not listed.
steps.content: Tap My issue is not listed . A new page will open.

steps.title: Fill in the details.
steps.content: Fill in the details. You'll need to include your Username , Email , and Mobile device . You'll also need to share details on your content being duplicated by others. Be very clear that you require verification to protect your account and content.

steps.title: Attach your ID.
steps.content: Attach your ID. Snapchat requires identification to prove you are who you say.

steps.title: Wait for Snapchat to respond.
steps.content: Wait for Snapchat to respond. This may take a few days. You will receive an email from Snapchat notifying you of your acceptance or rejection from Snap Star status.
